attributes.action: to call for the General Assembly of the Security Council to make Israel pay War Reparations to Gaza
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to call for the General Assembly of the Security Council to make Israel pay War Reparations to Gaza for their bombing of Gaza's Urban Infrastructure and damages to Gaza's Civilians wounded or having lost family or relations caused by 'Collateral Damage' during their Assault in which Israel is alleged to have used  banned illegal weaponry against those they have imprisoned in the Ghetto known as Gaza.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
